message: This is a one-time offer of a high-quality product for $10000. If you buy it, you'll be supporting a reputable seller with a proven track record, and you'll be getting a rare opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a fixed price. Don't miss out on this chance to make a great deal!
I trust your reputation and believe this is a fair deal for a high-quality product. Thank you for the opportunity.

This is a unique opportunity to get a high-quality product at a fixed price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

But if you're not comfortable with the uncertainty, I completely understand.
